title: TAKING DEEP BREATHS OF STARLIGHT
p2: Isaac Asimov famously said, “If my doctor told me I had only six minutes to live, I wouldn't brood. I’d type a little faster.”But what if you had only a few nights before major surgery? Would you stargaze a little faster?I’ve had the opportunity to find out.

title: CONTACT LOST WITH VOYAGER 2, BUT HEARTBEAT SIGNALS IT'S STILL ALIVE
p2: NASA detected a faint “heartbeat” signal from Voyager 2, after an erroneous command caused the spacecraft to lose contact with Earth.
